package.name: Kodi 19.0 (alpha)
package.shortDescription: This is a test for kodi 19 on AppleTV 12.04. Firmware should be 12.4

descriptionlist.description: Simply to test out hosting it on a repo for apple tv.

You can also have
a multi-line item.
